actions.name: Chromium Finish

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack
Effect: The attacker takes twice the damage the user took as Steel-type damage. When using Tempered Steel, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to change it to a Special-Category Attack.
